msContents.summary: Homiliary of the savior of the world, Dǝrsanä Mädḫane Aläm, ድርሳነ፡ መድኃኔ፡ ዓለም፡. F-57r: Book of the Passion and News of the Crucifixion of Our God and Savior Jesus Christ, መጽሐፈ ሕማማቲሁ ወዜና ስቅለቱ ለእግዜነ ወመድኃኒነ ኢየሱስ ክርስቶስ, for Mäggabit 27. F-63r: Fourteen Miracles of the Savior of the World, ተአምረ፡ መድኃኔ፡ ዓለም፡. Arranged for the months of the year: Mäggabit (1r), Miyazya (13r), Gǝnbot (15r), Säne (20r), Ḥamle (23r), Näḥase (28r), Mäskäräm (29v), Ṭǝqǝmt (32v), Ḫǝdar (40v), Taḫśaś (44r), Ṭǝrr (49r). has a concluding prayer for ገብረ ዋህድ, and his father, ተክለ ማርያም, and his mother, ወለተ አነንየ, his wife(?), ወለተ መድኀን, her father ገብረ እግዚአብሔር. F-70r: Image of the Passion of the Cross, Mälk‘a Ḥǝmamatä Mäsqäl, መልክአ፡ ሕማማት፡, Répertoire 91. Incipit: ሰላም: ለኪ: ማርያም: ድንግል: ዘመዓዛ: አፉኪ: ኮል: gives the name of the scribe, መገሕት ሠምረ ልቡ. The colophon mentions the owner ወይዘሮ ጸሕይነሽ ህድጐ. She paid 420 birr to the scribe and then she gave this book to Saint Mary Church of ደብረ ትዋህዶ "that it may lead her to the kingdom of God with her fathers and mothers and entire family."
